summary.Title: Head Chef Tapas Restaurant, Mo i Rana, Norway
summary.JobHeadline: Head Chef Tapas Restaurant, Mo i Rana, Norway
summary.Presentation: Vr Grill & Bar As, Mo i Rana, Norway, is looking for a head chef in a brand new concept.We are looking for a talented head chef with experience and a passion for Spanish tapas. Flexibi

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Head Chef Tapas Restaurant, Mo i Rana, Norway
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Vr Grill & Bar As, Mo i Rana, Norway, is looking for a head chef in a brand new concept.

We are looking for a talented head chef with experience and a passion for Spanish tapas.
Flexibility, a strong work ethic, and prior kitchen team management experience are required for employment with us.

We provide a small but close-knit culinary crew with a pleasant working atmosphere.

You are free to express your creativity.

Candidates must speak English, possess a culinary certificate, be self-sufficient and productive, and be able to take charge when working in a group.

About you:
  • Responsible for leading the team in the kitchen.
  • Planning and organization of purchasing and daily operations.
  • Design of new solutions and menu proposals.
  • Quality assurance and responsibility for follow-up according to the Norwegian Food Safety Authority's requirements.
  • Follow up IK-mat routines, order goods and stock count.
  • Quality assured food.
  • Work to achieve the company's objectives.
  • Part of a management team.


Qualifications and characteristics:
  • Vocational certificate as a chef.
  • Experience as a cook or Sous Chef.
  • Managerial experience and/or experience from abroad is desirable.
  • Takes initiative, is creative and engaged.
  • Independent and with the ability to work in a team.
  • Can speak Norwegian or English.
  • Yes I can! attitude and a flexible attitude.


We offer:
  • A good working environment.
  • Lots of fun challenges.
  • Good pay and working conditions.
  • The opportunity to hire your own team.
  • Temporary accommodation if desired, longer agreement.


More information:

Robin Myren, CEO, work@no3.no

How to apply?

as soon as possible:
  • online on https://arbeidsplassen.nav.no/stillinger/stilling/d396492b-67d5-4bd3-a3f7-6ff0678e560f
  • or by mail to work@no3.no


(from NAV EURES Norway)



After 10 years of operation as a northern Norwegian charcoal grill kitchen, we are now closing the restaurant to change the concept and layout. We are looking for a completely new kitchen team. With experience from Spanish and Mediterranean cuisine.

https://www.no3.no
